General.Name: JINSUNG T.E.C. Inc
General.Description: JINSUNG T.E.C., Inc. produces and sells heavy construction equipment under carriage parts in South Korea and internationally. The company offers track rollers, carrier rollers, sprockets, and idlers, as well as track spring assemblies and cutter tools. JINSUNG T.E.C., Inc. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
